racial-skills.name: bold
racial-skills.description: You gain a +5 racial bonus to saving throws against fear.

racial-skills.name: Nible Reaction
racial-skills.description: You gain a +2 racial bonus to AC against opportunity attacks.

racial-skills.name: Second Chance
racial-skills.description: When an attack hits you, force an enemy to roll the attack again. The enemy uses the second roll, even if it's lower.
